flawed_nl_solution:
Initially, the were 180//3= <<180//3=60>>60 plums on the plum tree.
When Damien picked 3/5 of the apples from the apple tree, he picked 3/5*180 = <<3/5*180=108>>108 apples
The number of apples remaining on the apple tree is 180-108= <<180-108=72>>72
The number of plums that Damien picked from the plum tree is 3/5*60 = <<3/5*60=300/3>>300/3
The number of plums remaining on the plum tree is 60-300/3 = <<60-300/3=-40>>-40
The total number of fruits remaining on the trees is 72 apples+-40 plums = <<72+-40=32>>32
#### 32

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 300/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
